name: map-modules
description: Expanded ASN.1 modules for Mobile Application Part (MAP) (3GPP TS 29.002) in JSON format

scripts.convert: cd 29002-e30\ ASN1 && for file in *Operations.EXP; do node ../convert "$file" > "../dist/$file.json" ; done
scripts.convert-min: cd 29002-e30\ ASN1 && for file in *Operations.EXP; do node ../convert "$file" --min > "../dist/$file.min.json" ; done

author: Ates Goral <ates@magnetiq.com> (http://magnetiq.com/)
